column5: Gonna be dropping off people at Copps Coliseum around 6pm then gotta kill 2 hours before I go in to watch Pearl Jam. So where can I go shore fish for a couple of hours within 10 or 15 minutes?
bayfront park is just down bay st.
Yup, head north on Bay, park is on your left, can't miss it...Bring lures for Largemouth or bait for carp.
Thanks guys. I'll give it a shot.
yo can fish all along the pier at the park thru the slop, or try some shorelines along the waterfront trail.  or - you could hit the peelers for 2 hours while you wait....
bayfront park for largemouth and/or carp
I'm heading to Copps for Pearl Jam tonight!
